functionDecorators.name: addCountryRestriction
functionDecorators.description: Adds country restriction. Identities from those countries will be forbidden to manipulate Tokens linked to this Compliance.

parameterDecorators.name: _country
parameterDecorators.description: Country to be restricted, should be expressed by following numeric ISO 3166-1 standard Only the owner of the Compliance smart contract can call this function emits an `AddedRestrictedCountry` event.

functionDecorators.name: batchRestrictCountries
functionDecorators.description: Adds countries restriction in batch. Identities from those countries will be forbidden to manipulate Tokens linked to this Compliance.

parameterDecorators.name: _countries
parameterDecorators.description: Countries to be restricted, should be expressed by following numeric ISO 3166-1 standard Only the owner of the Compliance smart contract can call this function emits an `AddedRestrictedCountry` event.

functionDecorators.name: batchUnrestrictCountries
functionDecorators.description: Removes countries restriction in batch. Identities from those countries will again be authorised to manipulate Tokens linked to this Compliance.

parameterDecorators.name: _countries
parameterDecorators.description: Countries to be unrestricted, should be expressed by following numeric ISO 3166-1 standard Only the owner of the Compliance smart contract can call this function emits an `RemovedRestrictedCountry` event.

functionDecorators.name: isCountryRestricted
functionDecorators.description: Returns true if country is Restricted.

parameterDecorators.name: _country
parameterDecorators.description: , numeric ISO 3166-1 standard of the country to be checked.

functionDecorators.name: isOwner
functionDecorators.description: Returns true if the caller is the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: owner
functionDecorators.description: Returns the address of the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: removeCountryRestriction
functionDecorators.description: Removes country restriction. Identities from those countries will again be authorised to manipulate Tokens linked to this Compliance.

parameterDecorators.name: _country
parameterDecorators.description: Country to be unrestricted, should be expressed by following numeric ISO 3166-1 standard Only the owner of the Compliance smart contract can call this function emits an `RemovedRestrictedCountry` event.

functionDecorators.name: renounceOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. * NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

functionDecorators.name: transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.
